data.title: @onCreate
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to a bot when it is first created

data.title: @onDestroy
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to a bot when it is being destroy.

data.title: @onModDrop
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to a bot that a mode was dropped on. If a custom @onModDrop is not specified, then the mod will be applied automatically. If a custom @onModDrop is specified, then the mod needs to be applied manually via applyMod(bot, ...mods).

data.title: @onModDropEnter
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to the bot that a mod started to be dragged onto.

data.title: @onModDropExit
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to the bot that a mod was just dragged off of.

data.title: @onClick
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to the bot that was clicked.

data.title: @onKeyClick
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to the bot when a key is clicked on it. This event will only be available for bots that have their #form set to keyboard.

data.title: @onPointerEnter
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to a bot when the mouse cursor starts to hover over it.

data.title: @onPointerExit
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to a bot when the mouse cursor stops hovering over it.

data.title: @onPointerDown
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to a bot when the user starts clicking it.

data.title: @onPointerUp
data.concept: A whisper that is sent to a bot when the user stops clicking it.

data.title: @onDrag
data.concept: A whisper that is sent whenever a bot is starting to be dragged.
